author: Jonathan Cheng
title: China’s First-Quarter GDP Plunges on Coronavirus - The Wall Street Journal
description: China’s First-Quarter GDP Plunges on Coronavirus The Wall Street Journal China’s G.D.P. Shrank in the First Quarter: Live Updates The New York Times China says its economy shrank by 6.8% in the first quarter as the country battled coronavirus CNBC Coronavirus…
content:
BEIJINGChinas economy plummeted 6.8% in the first three months of the year compared with a year earlier, the countrys first such drop since Beijing began reporting quarterly gross domestic product in 1992.
The sharp contraction in the worlds second-largest e… [+207 chars]
